title: Pokémon Go ‘Crown Clash’ event guide

excerpt: Make way, royalty is entering the room

html:
Image: Niantic

Julia Lee (she/her) is a guides producer, writing guides for games like The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom and Pokémon Go. She helped launch the Rift Herald in 2016.

Pokémon Go is running a royal-themed event, “Crown Clash,” that started May 10 and will run through May 18. The event features Nidoqueen and Nidoking wearing crowns, as well as the debut of Kingambit, the evolution of Bisharp.

In addition to the special spawns and stuff, there’s also a bonus that rewards doubled XP for evolving Pokémon. You also can find shiny versions of the crown-wearing Nidoqueen and Nidokings at an “increased chance,” alongside Slowpoke, Combee, and Litleo. Catching a Slowpoke may also net you a King’s Rock evolution item.

Below we list the perks and bonuses for Pokémon Go’s “Crown Clash” event, including the boosted spawns and Collection Challenge. Notably, there is no Timed Research for this event.

Table of Contents

  • Pokémon Go ‘Crown Clash’ event Collection Challenges
    • ‘The Crowned’ Collection Challenge
  • Pokémon Go ‘Crown Clash’ event Field Research and rewards
  • Pokémon Go ‘Crown Clash’ event boosted spawns
  • Pokémon Go ‘Crown Clash’ event raid targets

Pokémon Go ‘Crown Clash’ event Collection Challenges

The following Collection Challenge will be live throughout the duration of the event:

‘The Crowned’ Collection Challenge

  • Catch a Snivy
  • Evolve a Servine into Serperior
  • Catch a Piplup
  • Evolve a Prinplup into Empoleon
  • Catch a Slakoth
  • Evolve a Vigoroth into Slaking
  • Catch a Combee
  • Evolve a Combee into Vespiquen
  • Catch a Slowpoke
  • Evolve a Slowpoke into Slowking
  • Catch a Litleo
  • Evolve a Litleo into Pyroar

Reward: Pawniard encounter, 5,000 Stardust, 10,000 XP

Completing the Collection Challenge will also net another bonus: All trainers level 31+ will get a guaranteed Candy XL for evolving Pokémon.

Pokémon Go ‘Crown Clash’ event Field Research and rewards

Spinning a PokéStop during the event period may yield one of these tasks:

  • Catch 10 Pokémon (Slakoth, Piplup, or Litleo encounter)
  • Evolve 2 Pokémon (Slowpoke, Combee, or Snivy encounter)
  • Power up Pokémon 5 times (Sneasel, Klink, or Pawniard encounter)
  • Win a raid (Sneasel, Klink, or Pawniard encounter)
  • Win 2 raids (Nidoqueen [crown] or Nidoking [crown] encounter)

Pokémon Go ‘Crown Clash’ event boosted spawns

These Pokémon will spawn more frequently during the event period:

  • Slowpoke*
  • Slakoth
  • Piplup
  • Combee*
  • Snivy
  • Pawniard
  • Litleo*

*There is an “increased chance” of finding this shiny in the wild as part of the event.

Pokémon Go ‘Crown Clash’ event raid targets

The following changes to the raid schedule will take place as part of the event:

‘Crown Clash’ raid line-up

One-star raids

Three-star raids

SneaselNidoqueen (crown)*
KlinkNidoking (crown)*
Pawniard

*These Pokémon have an “increased chance” of being shiny when raided.
